==Useful Info==
An '''apis''' is a rare [[yak]]-type monster. They are mostly restricted to [[holy]] [[Pandemonium]] levels and [[Ziggurat]] floors, though they can also be found in a holy-themed [[Shoals]]:4 [[vault]]. They behave like all yaks, moving into melee range and hitting surprisingly hard with their holy horns (especially dangerous to [[undead]] or [[demonspawn]] characters).

==Tips & Tricks==
*Think of them as [[death yak]]s but stronger, particularly if you're vulnerable to [[holy]] damage.

==Trivia==
The [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apis_(god) apis] was a sacred bull worshiped in ancient Egypt.

==History==
*In [[0.31]], apis can now appear in a holy-themed [[Shoals]]:4 vault.
*Prior to [[0.15]], [[Elyvilon]] could punish the player for killing an apis by inflicting irresistible but temporary [[weakness]]. Also, hostile apis could turn neutral if the player worshipped a [[good god]] and was sufficiently [[Piety|pious]].
*In [[0.14]], apis were supposed to appear in the [[Enchanted Forest]].
*Prior to [[0.13]], killing an apis did not trigger Elyvilon's wrath.
